WHAT_IS_APP.TITLE: What is this app?
WHAT_IS_APP.DESCRIPTION: This application will guide you step by step to perform the Mini Cog test with a loved one.

WHAT_IS_MINICOG.TITLE: What is the Mini Cog?
WHAT_IS_MINICOG.DESCRIPTION: The Mini Cog test is a brief cognitive screening tool used to detect cognitive impairment in older adults. It consists of a three-item memory recall test and a simple clock-drawing test.

WHO_IS_THIS_FOR.TITLE: Who is this for?
WHO_IS_THIS_FOR.DESCRIPTION: This test is designed to be administered by one person to another, such as a family member or loved one.

BEFORE_WE_START.TITLE: Before we begin
BEFORE_WE_START.PERSON_ATTENTION: Make sure the person is paying attention
BEFORE_WE_START.EXPLAIN: Explain that you'll ask them to remember three words and draw a clock
BEFORE_WE_START.QUIET_PLACE: Find a quiet place with no distractions

WORD_RECALL.TITLE: Remember 3 Words
WORD_RECALL.DESCRIPTION: In this part of the test, you will ask the person to remember three words. Say the words one by one and ask the person to repeat them. After you have said all three words, ask the person to repeat them again. If the person can recall all three words, proceed to the next part of the test.
WORD_RECALL.REPEAT: Repeat the words if necessary, but do not provide additional information or hints.
WORD_RECALL.UNABLE_REPEAT: If the person cannot repeat the words after three attempts, move to Step 2 (clock drawing).
WORD_RECALL.ASK_REPEAT: After saying the three words, ask the person to repeat them.
WORD_RECALL.LOOK: Look directly at the person and say:
WORD_RECALL.PLEASE_LISTEN: ‚ÄúPlease listen carefully. I am going to say three words that I want you to repeat now and try to remember.

CLOCK_DRAWING.TITLE: Clock Drawing
CLOCK_DRAWING.DESCRIPTION: Give the person a blank piece of paper and a pen or pencil.
CLOCK_DRAWING.CIRCLE_PAPER: It is acceptable to provide a piece of paper with a pre-drawn circle for the person.
CLOCK_DRAWING.REQUEST: Say: ‚ÄúNext, I want you to draw a clock for me. First, put all the numbers where they belong.‚Äù
CLOCK_DRAWING.DRAW_HOUR: When that is complete, say: ‚ÄúNow, set the hands to
CLOCK_DRAWING.REPEAT_INFO: Repeat instructions as needed, as this is not a memory test.
CLOCK_DRAWING.UNABLE_DRAW: Move to Step 3 if the clock is incomplete after three minutes.

SCORE_WORDS.TITLE: Scoring Word Recall
SCORE_WORDS.REQUEST: You will ask the person to recall the set of 3 words given at the beginning of the test.
SCORE_WORDS.QUESTION: Say: ‚ÄúWhat were the three words I asked you to remember?‚Äù
SCORE_WORDS.WRITE_DOWN: Write down the words the person said.
SCORE_WORDS.SCORE_BASIS: Give 1 point for each correct word without hints.

SCORE_CLOCK.TITLE: Scoring Clock Drawing
SCORE_CLOCK.SCORE_BASIS: 2 points for a normal clock or 0 points for an abnormal clock drawing.
SCORE_CLOCK.CORRECT_CLOCK: A normal clock should include all numbers (1-12), each only once, in the correct order and direction (clockwise).
SCORE_CLOCK.CORRECT_HANDS: There should also be two hands, one pointing to 11 and the other to 2.

RESULTS.TITLE: Results
RESULTS.BRIEF_DESCRIPTION: Total Score = Word Recall Score + Clock Drawing Score.
RESULTS.CUT_POINT: A score of less than 3 on the Mini-Cog‚Ñ¢ has been validated for dementia detection, but many people with significant cognitive impairment may score higher.
RESULTS.INTERPRETATION: For greater sensitivity, a score of less than 4 is recommended, as it may indicate the need for further cognitive evaluation.

HISTORY.TITLE: History
HISTORY.NO_DATA: No data loaded yet. Complete a test to see it here.

COMMENT.TITLE: Leave us a comment
COMMENT.PLACEHOLDER: What did you think about the app? How can we improve it?
COMMENT.INFO: Your opinion is private and will only be used to improve the app and provide a better experience for our users.
